member.name: IDXGIObject.GetParent
member.summary: Gets the parent of the object.
member.param: The ID of the requested interface.
The address of a pointer to the parent object.
member.returns: Returns one of the DXGI_ERROR values.

member.name: IDXGIObject.SetPrivateData
member.summary: Sets application-defined data to the object and associates that data with a GUID.
member.param: A GUID that identifies the data. Use this GUID in a call to to get the data.
The size of the object's data.
A pointer to the object's data.
member.returns: Returns one of the DXGI_ERROR values.

member.name: IDXGIObject.SetPrivateDataInterface
member.summary: Set an interface in the object's private data.
member.returns: Returns one of the following DXGI_ERROR.

member.name: IDXGIObject
member.summary: An IDXGIObject interface is a base interface for all DXGI objects;IDXGIObject supports associating caller-defined (private data) with an object and retrieval of an interface to the parent object.
